channel.description:

Xuniquex is a 317 PI server We have huge plans for his server. You are looking at what will be one of the best servers that you've ever seen. We plan on making this server a hell of a lot of fun, and if you come and join us you can get an early start on what will be one of the best.
Currently, we have a two server developers, and a forums developer. Server is 24/7 online!
Download Now:-[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/b9wetlhrpegqy9n/client.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/b9wetlhrpegqy9n/client.jar[/url] Website:- [url=http://www.xuniquexrsps.tk]www.xuniquexrsps.tk[/url]
www.Xuniquexrsps.tk www.xuniquexrsps.tk
Join Xuniquex today, and get a head start!
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/10p0vpg.png[/img]Welcome To Xuniquex.[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/10p0vpg.png[/img]
Xuniquex is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/295fj0w.png[/img]Start playing now[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/295fj0w.png[/img]
There are two ways to play Xuniquex, through our Webclient or through our downloadable client. The webclient is great if you're just starting out, however, the downloadable client is great for regular players as you can access it from your desktop!
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/wcfi4n.png[/img]Still not convinced?[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/wcfi4n.png[/img]
Our server features a vibrant, helpful community with plenty of players on the server, friendly people, perfect combat, following and protection against cheaters and dupers. We also have some features that set us apart from the real RuneScape game, including: Xuniquex-Wars, our custom minigame, some custom items and weapons and different areas!
I Hope You Enjoy Playing Xuniquex Rsps. Thnx[/size]
[color=#1E90FF][size=4]Features:
All skills works Nex and alot of bosses Minigames Skilling area Leve Points Shop Trivia Bot Shop Donator Points Shop Fully curse Quick prayer sellect Hybrid swich (perfect for pking) Trivia Bot.[/size][/color][/b] More Coming Soon..
[size=4]- Combat
PvP PvM MvM X-Logging Properly Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Perfect switching between equipment Every weapon special attack Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) Equipment requirements
- Magic
Every modern combat spell Every ancient combat spell Can't mage through walls Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working Weakening spells Teleblock/binding/freezing Alching/Superheat
- Ranged
Bows/arrows Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
- Prayer
All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/size]

Join Xuniquex today, and get a head start!

Welcome To Xuniquex.

Xuniquex is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.

Start playing now

There are two ways to play Xuniquex, through our Webclient or through our downloadable client. The webclient is great if you’re just starting out, however, the downloadable client is great for regular players as you can access it from your desktop!

Still not convinced?

Our server features a vibrant, helpful community with plenty of players on the server, friendly people, perfect combat, following and protection against cheaters and dupers.
